input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product features and product name information.

Product name:
Reynolds Freezer Paper 150 Sq. Ft. (Pack of 6)

Product features:
Plastic-coated Kraft paper used for wrapping foods for freezing and general household purposes
Easy-to-write-on surface
Plastic coating provides a barrier to air and moisture to protect the quality, flavor and nutrition of foods during freezing
Buy food in bulk and save money

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Reynolds Freezer Paper 150 Sq. Ft. is a great way to save money by buying food in bulk and storing it in the freezer. The plastic-coated Kraft paper is easy to write on and provides a barrier to air and moisture, protecting the quality, flavor, and nutrition of foods during freezing. The Reynolds Freezer Paper is a perfect solution for wrapping meats, poultry, fish, and vegetables before freezing, and it's also great for wrapping leftovers and storing prepared foods in the refrigerator or freezer. Keep your freezer organized and food fresh longer with Reynolds Freezer Paper.
input_text.Response B: Looking for a deal!  This REYNOLDS FREEZER PAPER 150 Sq. Ft comes in a pack of 6!  Reynolds Freezer Paper is a plastic-coated Kraft paper used for wrapping foods for freezing and for general household purposes. The paper gives the product strength and durability as well as an easy-to-write-on surface, while the plastic coating provides a barrier to air and moisture to protect the quality, flavor and nutrition of foods during freezing.  In these tough times this will save you money in the long run, if you buy in bulk and freeze.

label_annotations.feedback:
flavor is spelt flavour
a comma before the last "and" in a list is a contentious grammar point.
